tech.tablesaw.table

Class Projection

  • java.lang.Object
    • tech.tablesaw.table.Relation
      • tech.tablesaw.table.Projection

  • public class Projection
extends Relation
    A table projection, i.e. the subset of columns in a table that should be returned in a query
